Name of Company:  Bisleri international Pvt Ltd
Title  of  Report: To  Study  the  brand  awareness  of   bisleri  product  (Vedica  spring
sections.PROJECTS:
water)amongst consumers in East Delhi & NOIDA  region.
Findings :
•
Some retailers have left selling the vedica because margin was not given as like other
companies like qua, evian etc.
•
Amongst all the products, overall sales of vedica 1ltr bottle are highest.
•
Vedica products in capacity of 250ml and 500 ml are  in more demand on special
occasions like marriage, party and there is scarcity of supply of these products.
•
Unable to deliver the stock on time (on a short notice).
Suggestions:
•
Quality of packaging should be improved.
•
More focus should be on distribution channel for on time delivery of products.
